short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily control YouTube playback speed with a custom speed tuner and enjoy videos at your pace.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With YouTube Speed Tuner, you can adjust playback speeds on YouTube videos between 0.1x and 16x. This extension integrates into the YouTube player controls, allowing for easy speed adjustments to match your viewing preferences, whether you're slowing down content for clarity or speeding up to save time.

If you encounter any issues or have feedback, feel free to reach out via email to report bugs or share your suggestions
